daily_analysis.reasoning: Price shows a clear dominant decline over the visible 30+ candles (lower highs and lower lows). A recent large red candle on the right side engulfs the prior green bar near current price, marking a bearish engulfing at a resistance area (~0.7990–0.7965). In a downtrend this qualifies as a sell setup; zone kept to ~25 pips width and placed near current price.

m30_analysis.reasoning: A clear bearish engulfing on the M30 (large red candle that engulfs the prior green move) occurs at the sharp drop ~21:00 and its wick range overlaps the Daily zone 0.7965–0.799. The entry zone was marked wick-to-wick but narrowed to the core overlap (0.7965–0.7990) to keep the zone within the required 20–30 pip width.
